name: SOG SlimJim Folding Knife Black SJ32 CP

reviews.name: SOG SlimJim Black TiNi Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText: Carry daily. Design is great, assisted opening takes a sec to get use to. My only issue with this device is that even while the lock is engaged, there is a possibility of the blade sticking out of the grip while in my pocket. This has lead to me stabbing myself on the first occasion, snagging the inside of my pockets with the blade a couple, and having to check it every time before I take it out. Otherwise... Great product.
reviews.title: great but flawed

reviews.name: SOG SlimJim Black TiNi Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText: I received my slimjim last week and absolutely love it!! Very intelligent design, very functional and extremely discrete for easy concealment. I use the slimjim as my backup "gentlemen carry" knife to my other SOG full size tanto points. As a general point, I have become a huge fan of SOG. Their blades are superior and their customer service is as responsive as their open assist.
reviews.title: Great back up carry blade!

reviews.name: SOG SlimJim Black TiNi Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText: I got this knife about 6 months ago, I'm glade I did I never leave home with out it. One of my favorite knives if my not my #1. Awesome how thin it is
reviews.title: Great edc knife

reviews.name: SOG SlimJim Black TiNi Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText: Purchased several of these knives as gifts my groomsmen. I also purchased engraving. Everything looked wonderful and the men loved them. Light slim knife, highly recommended.
reviews.title: Excellent Knife

reviews.name: SOG SlimJim Black TiNi Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText: I got the knife in April, and It's honestly one of my favorite knives, its light, it opens quickly, I mean the safety can be annoying at times but it is a nice feature to have. The blade also holds an edge for a decent length of time.
reviews.title: It's a good knife
